metadata.Title: CVE-2019-1010054 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low.
metadata.Description: Dolibarr 7.0.0 is affected by: Cross Site Request Forgery (CSRF). The impact is: allow malitious html to change user password, disable users and disable password encryptation. The component is: Function User password change, user disable and password encryptation. The attack vector is: admin access malitious urls.

criterions.comment: dolibarr: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
